txt.en: Among its many pages, Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the battle at Azanulbizar includes a number of detailed maps.
You have learned of the many caches recovered during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
You have learned of the wide reach of Azog's realm during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
You have learned of the many dwarf-ruins among the beautiful wilds that still stood during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
You have learned of the war-camp of Thráin at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
Among its many pages, Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the battle at Azanulbizar includes a number of detailed maps.
